explosive module¶

class explosive.Explosive(anim, start_pos, angle, collidables, power)¶

Bases: projectile.Projectile

A class for any weapon that has the ability to explode.

Parameters:
  • anim – The sprite sheet to use for animating.
  • start_pos – Will get passed to projectile.
  • angle – Will get passed to projectile.
  • collidables – Sprites that the Explosive can collide with.
  • power – The multiplier added to the distance of the shot.
collision_check()¶

If collision with any collidables occurs, draw an ellipse representing the explosion

update(world)¶

Update the explosive weapon.

Parameters:world – The world in which the explosive exists.
